utils

Class RandomGraphMaker2

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.RandomGraphMaker2

  • public class RandomGraphMaker2
extends java.lang.Object
    builds a random graph, given the number of nodes and the average node degree in the graph (and optionally of course, the random seed). Random weights may be assigned to the graph nodes as well.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

        private Graph buildRandomGraph()
                        throws GraphException,

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        invoke as: java -cp <classpath> utils.RandomGraphMaker2 <numnodes> <avgnodedegree> <filename> [rndseed] [nodeweightsvariance]. If the randomnodeweightsvariance option is set to some positive number then the graph will have weights assigned to its nodes that will be random numbers drawn from the gaussian distribution, with mean equal to the node degree, and variance the specified value. If the option is set to some negative number, then the weights will be drawn from the discrete uniform distribution U[1,-N] if the number (N) is integer, and from the continuous uniform C[0,-f] if the number (f) is fractional. If the option is not set, all node weights will be set to 1.0.
        Parameters:
        args - String[]
